duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead site's indirect procurement operations including forecasting, inventory management, and purchase order management
Manage supplier management KPI and metrics reporting, and work with stakeholders to find deviation and improvement areas
Develop relationship across the building and network to ensure best practices are being shared and implemented
Coordinate the demand identification, procurement, and inventory management of all non-merchandise items
Partner with Category team to manage and maintain supplier scorecards
Support the procurement operations and category management teams

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
